thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 6 of 108
thread.title: AKN

author: AKN
title: AKN
text: I was hesitant to use this service because it looked too good to be true, but my cousin uses a similar service and likes it so I decided to give it a try for holiday shopping. It takes a little while for the rebates to process, but it makes sense once you read how it all works. Top Cashback seems quite transparent. So far I have gotten a couple hundred dollars back and I like that I can give a tip to the TC staff when I get my payout (if nothing else, I can just tip the extra 3% I get by getting my payouts through Amazon, but I usually do a bit more). The service is so easy to use on your computer or phone (so long as you don't mind using the website to order instead of an app). Give it a try!
